body:
Hi guys, I like texturing swords but not playing mc that much so if someone needs a cool sword tell me everything you want and I will try making the best out of it!

512x swords

title: Noahs Swords Thread

replies.body: Can you make a dark red sword (w/black hilt) with some shading using an atmospheric (red) nebula picture?
replies.body_tagged: Can you make a dark red sword (w/black hilt) with some shading using an atmospheric (red) nebula picture?

replies.body: Make a sword with a darkish purple hilt and a glorious purple blade ;)
replies.body_tagged: Make a sword with a darkish purple hilt and a glorious purple blade ;)
